action_title: Airborne translocation of mammals using parachutes
key_messages:
Key Messages:

One study evaluated the effects of airborne translocation of mammals using parachutes. This study was in the USA.

COMMUNITY RESPONSE (0 STUDIES)
POPULATION RESPONSE (1 STUDY)

Survival (1 study): A study in the USAÂ found that at least some North American beavers translocated using parachutes established territories and survived over one year after release.

BEHAVIOUR (0 STUDIES)
